function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through surface contacts and fomites","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, minimizing unnecessary hand-object contact, and avoiding touching the face","Technologies":"Surface disinfectants, UV-C light for disinfection","People":"Non-infected individuals, particularly those in public environments","Owner":"Health organizations, facility management, and individuals"}]}
